mwe.mwe: iemand zal er met de pet naar gooien
mwe.xpath: // node[ node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="met" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="de" and @rel="det" and @pt="lid" and @lwtype="bep"] and node[@lemma="pet" and @rel="hd" and @pt="n" and @ntype="soort" and (@genus="zijd" or @getal="mv") and @getal="ev" and @graad="basis"]]] and node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="er" and @rel="obj1" and @pt="vnw" and @vwtype="aanw" and @getal="getal" and @persoon="3"] and node[@lemma="naar" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="fin"]] and node[@lemma="gooien" and @rel="hd" and @pt="ww"]]

mwe.mwe: iemand zal de schuld op iemand schuiven
mwe.xpath: // node[ node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="de" and @rel="det" and @pt="lid" and @lwtype="bep"] and node[@lemma="schuld" and @rel="hd" and @pt="n" and @ntype="soort" and (@genus="zijd" or @getal="mv") and @getal="ev" and @graad="basis"]] and node[@lemma="schuiven" and @rel="hd" and @pt="ww"] and ( ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="op" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="obj1"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@rel="obj1" and (@lemma="er" or @lemma="hier" or @lemma="daar" or @lemma="waar" or @lemma="ergens" or @lemma="nergens" or @lemma="overal")] and node[@lemma="op" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="fin"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and node[@rel="mod" and @pt="dummy" and @begin="0" and @end="0" and @word="dummy"]] and node[@lemma="op" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="fin"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="op" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="pobj1"] and node[@rel="vc"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="erop" and @rel="hd"] and node[@rel="vc"]] ) or ( node[(@lemma="waarop" or @lemma="daarop" or @lemma="hierop" or @lemma="erop") and (@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm")] ) )]

mwe.mwe: iemand zal goed aan iets doen
mwe.xpath: // node[ node[@lemma="goed" and @rel="mod" and @pt="adj" and @graad="basis"] and node[@lemma="doen" and @rel="hd" and @pt="ww"] and ( ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="aan" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="obj1"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@rel="obj1" and (@lemma="er" or @lemma="hier" or @lemma="daar" or @lemma="waar" or @lemma="ergens" or @lemma="nergens" or @lemma="overal")] and node[@lemma="aan" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="fin"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and node[@rel="mod" and @pt="dummy" and @begin="0" and @end="0" and @word="dummy"]] and node[@lemma="aan" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="fin"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="aan" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="pobj1"] and node[@rel="vc"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="eraan" and @rel="hd"] and node[@rel="vc"]] ) or ( node[(@lemma="waaraan" or @lemma="daaraan" or @lemma="hieraan" or @lemma="eraan") and (@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm")] ) )]

mwe.mwe: iemand zal geen mouw aan iets weten te passen
mwe.xpath: // node[ node[@lemma="weten" and @rel="hd" and @pt="ww"] and node[@rel="vc" and @cat="ti" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="te" and @rel="cmp" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="body" and @cat="inf" and count(node)=4 and node[@begin="0" and @end="1" and @rel="su"] and node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="geen" and @rel="det" and @pt="vnw" and @vwtype="onbep"] and node[@lemma="mouw" and @rel="hd" and @pt="n" and @ntype="soort" and (@genus="zijd" or @getal="mv") and @getal="ev" and @graad="basis"]] and node[@lemma="passen" and @vztype="fin"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and node[@rel="mod" and @pt="dummy" and @begin="0" and @end="0" and @word="dummy"]] and node[@lemma="aan" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="fin"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="aan" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="pobj1"] and node[@rel="vc"]] ) or ( node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="eraan" and @rel="hd"] and node[@rel="vc"]] ) or ( node[(@lemma="waaraan" or @lemma="daaraan" or @lemma="hieraan" or @lemma="eraan") and (@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm")] ) )]]]

mwe.mwe: iemand zal iets door de vingers zien
mwe.xpath: // node[ node[(@rel="pc" or @rel="ld" or @rel="mod" or @rel="predc" or @rel="svp" or @rel="predm") and @cat="pp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="door" and @rel="hd" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="obj1" and @cat="np" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="de" and @rel="det" and @pt="lid" and @lwtype="bep"] and node[@lemma="vinger" and @rel="hd" and @pt="n" and @ntype="soort" and @getal="mv" and @graad="basis"]]] and node[@lemma="zien" and @rel="hd" and @pt="ww"] and ( ( node[@rel="obj1"] ) or ( node[@rel="vc"] ) or ( node[@rel="pobj1"] and node[@rel="vc"] ) )]

//node[ self:: node[ node[@cat="ap" and node[@lemma="doof" and @rel="hd" and @pt="adj"] and node[@lemma="zo" and @rel="mod" and @pt="bw"]] and node[(@rel="predm" or @rel="mod") and @cat="cp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="als" and @rel="cmp" and @pt="vz" and @vztype="init"] and node[@rel="body" and @cat="np" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="een" and @rel="det" and @pt="lid" and @lwtype="onbep"] and node[@lemma="kwartel" and @rel="hd" and @pt="n" and @ntype="soort" and (@genus="zijd" or @getal="mv") and @getal="ev" and @graad="basis"]]]] | self:: node[@cat="ap" and node[@lemma="doof" and @rel="hd" and @pt="adj"] and node[@rel="mod" and @cat="advp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="zo" and @rel="hd" and @pt="bw"] and node[@rel="obcomp" and @cat="cp" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="als" and @rel="cmp" and @pt="vg" and @conjtype="onder"] and node[@rel="body" and @cat="np" and count(node)=2 and node[@lemma="een" and @rel="det" and @pt="lid" and @lwtype="onbep"] and node[@lemma="kwartel" and @rel="hd" and @pt="n" and @ntype="soort" and (@genus="zijd" or @getal="mv") and @getal="ev" and @graad="basis"]]]]] ]
